segmentosSRT.text: This is our town leader, Mr. Niu.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06

segmentosSRT.text:
Long live Chairman Mao!
Down with the counterrevolutionaries!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06

segmentosSRT.text: Give it to us if you can't finish.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06

segmentosSRT.text: What the hell are you doing?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06

segmentosSRT.text:
June 1966: Start of the
"Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution."
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06

segmentosSRT.text:
Nothing compares
to the Party's benevolence
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06

segmentosSRT.text:
Chairman Mao is dearer
than father and mother
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06

segmentosSRT.text: There's nothing as good as socialism
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06

segmentosSRT.text: No ocean as deep as class feeling
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06

segmentosSRT.text:
Maoist Thought
is revolution's treasure trove
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06

segmentosSRT.text: Whoever opposes it, we take as our enemy
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06

segmentosSRT.text: The only child I have left.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia! Mommy's here. Don't be afraid.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06
